Directed by Sam Boyd. Erin Feeley. Ed Lilly. Isabel Sandoval. Jonathan Levine. Robin Wright

Written by Sinead Daly. Chisa Hutchinson. Bill Kennedy. Carola Lovering. Samir Mehta. Mona Mira. Meaghan Oppenheimer

Cast Grace Van Patten( Lucy Albright10 episodes, 2022 ). Jackson White( Stephen DeMarco10 episodes, 2022 ). Catherine Missal( Bree10 episodes, 2022 ). Spencer House( Wrigley10 episodes, 2022 ). Sonia Mena( Pippa10 episodes, 2022 ). Branden Cook( Evan10 episodes, 2022 ). Benjamin Wadsworth( Drew10 episodes, 2022 ). Alicia Crowder( Diana10 episodes, 2022 ). Tyriq Withers( Tim6 episodes, 2022 ). Edmund Donovan( Max5 episodes, 2022 ). Gabriella Pession( Marianne5 episodes, 2022 ). Jade Fernandez( Nellie4 episodes, 2022 ). Zoe Renee( Charlie3 episodes, 2022 ). Natalee Linez( Lydia Montgomery3 episodes, 2022 ). Andrea Prevatt( Allie3 episodes, 2022 ). Jessica Capshaw( CJ Albright3 episodes, 2022 ). Katey Sagal( Nora2 episodes, 2022 ). Jennifer Leigh Mann( Beth Campbell2 episodes, 2022 ). Jacobi Hollingshed( Marcus2 episodes, 2022 ). Dianna Catterton( Grocery Store Clerk1 episode, 2022 ). Brooklynn( Barista1 episode, 2022 ). Joe Sterrey( Writing Student1 episode, 2022 ). Nic Starr( Old Man1 episode, 2022 ). Malone Thomas( Jessica1 episode, 2022 ). Jake Howarth( Bro-y Associate1 episode, 2022 ). Elizabeth Pan( Sharon1 episode, 2022 ). Omer Mughal( Doctor1 episode, 2022 ). Kayo Terrell( Kid1 episode, 2022 ). Cody Ray Lee( Vince DeMarco1 episode, 2022 ). Lizzy Liu( Sorority Girl1 episode, 2022 ). Cedric Greenway( Officer Dan1 episode, 2022 ). Lysander Mane( Frat Guy 11 episode, 2022 ). Charlotte Ann Tucker( Adorable Little Girl1 episode, 2022 ). Ben Ortega( Frat Guy 21 episode, 2022 ). Savanna Gann( Susie1 episode, 2022 ). Jacinte Blankenship( Melissa1 episode, 2022 ). Ines Sanchez-Nagakane( Student1 episode, 2022 ). Stephen Jared( Daniel DeMarco1 episode, 2022 ). Raiany Silva( Receptionist1 episode, 2022 ). Jamie Moore( Warren1 episode, 2022 ). Rae DeRosa( Party Girl1 episode, 2022 ). Kulani Kai( Abby1 episode, 2022 ). George Bryant( Dean1 episode, 2022 ). Garrett Hines( James Davenport1 episode, 2022 ). Ryan Vo( Party Guy1 episode, 2022 ). Charday Leslie( Volunteer1 episode, 2022 ). Stephen Matthew Smith( Rob1 episode, 2022 ). Ryan Dann( Bartender1 episode, 2022 ). Kellen Boyle( Drunk Guy1 episode, 2022 ). Jennifer Haralson( Hostess1 episode, 2022 ). Dimitrius Pulido( Waiter1 episode, 2022 ). Michael Hanson( Waiter1 episode, 2022 ). Paul Brian Johnson( Officer1 episode, 2022 ). Phoenix Jd Gabe( Wrigley Understudy (uncredited)7 episodes, 2022 ). Cora Maple Lindell( College Student (uncredited)2 episodes, 2022 ). Lovell Gates( College Student (uncredited)2 episodes, 2022 ). Roger Berard( Hootie The Owl / … (uncredited)2 episodes, 2022 ). Joshua Allen( College Student (uncredited)2 episodes, 2022 ). Alex D. Jennings( Football Player (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Sarah Kopkin( Sorority Girl (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Ryan Austin Bryant( College Student (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Jerard McWhirter( Evan’s Father (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Kate Riddle( Friendly Server (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Emily Rachel Gordon( A Cappella Singer #1 (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Peyton Adkins( College Party Student (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Kahlen Barry( Acapella Group Singer (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 )

Language English

Producers Laura Lewis. Matthew Matruski. Jessica Badenoch. Gillian Bohrer. Sinead Daly. Stephanie Drachkovitch. Shannon Gibson. Mathew Hart. Bill Kennedy. Jonathan Levine. Carola Lovering. Samir Mehta. Mona Mira. Meaghan Oppenheimer. Karah Preiss. Emma Roberts. Samantha Schlaifer

Production 20th Television. Belletrist. Rebelle Media.

Season 1

Episodes 10
